description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76026-KIDNEY: Biopsy.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: FUHRMAN_NUCLR_GRD_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade (Fuhrman Nuclear Grade).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not applicable


GX: Cannot be assessed


G1: Nuclei round, uniform, approximately 10 �m; nucleoli inconspicuous or absent


G2: Nuclei slightly irregular, approximately 15 �m; nucleoli evident


G3: Nuclei very irregular, approximately 20 �m; nucleoli large and prominent


G4: Nuclei bizarre and multilobated, 20 �m or greater, nucleoli prominent, chromatin 


Other

columns.name: SARCOMATOID_FEAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Sarcomatoid Features.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Cannot be assessed


Not identified


Absent


Present


Indeterminate


Portal vein invasion present


Hepatic vein invasion present


Present within tumor nodules


Present in vessels of parenchyma outside of tumor nodules


Cannot be determined

columns.name: PERCN_SARCOMAT_ELEM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Percentage Sarcomatoid Element.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.
